Articles.Content:
So, I have really gotten addicted to Kerbal in recent months, and I thought I'd post my ship up for consideration, and get feedback.

I have thus far been able to land it safely on Mun, and Minmus. With lower gravity on Minmus, the fuel consumption to get a 2-3/ms landing is a lot easier then on the Mun, so I tend to have less fuel for the return trip on my Mun trips.

The design is simple, but it works!

And, landing on Minmus left me with a rather interesting position, which you'll see in the screen shots.

I have video of the ship sitting in the way that it is for proof, sadly I don't have video of the actual landing.

If you want to get rid of the wobble that exists, remove the ladders on the 2nd stage, and add stabilizers.

Edited August 4, 2012 by Dariuas
